languages.text: "Я запретил{mf||а} твоему культу убивать, а ты подстроила смерть блюстительницы, творила кровавое гадание".

traits.locale_text: "Я запретил{mf||а} твоему культу убивать, а ты взяла и подстроила смерть блюстительницы, а потом и человека в жертву принесла!"

languages.text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."
languages.original_text: "Я запретил{mf||а} твоему культу убивать, а ты подстроила смерть блюстительницы, творила кровавое гадание".

traits.locale_text: "I forbade your cult from killing, yet you arranged that enforcer's death and used the blood of innocents for your divination."
"I forbade your cult from killing, yet you arranged that enforcer's death and used the blood of innocents for your divination."
"I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also used the blood of innocents for your divination."
"I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also used the blood of innocents for your divination."
"I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."
"I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."

languages.text: «Prohibí expresamente a su culto que cometiese ningún asesinato; y no solo dispuso usted la muerte de ese guardia, sino que encima llevó a cabo una adivinación de sangre».
languages.original_text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."

traits.locale_text: «Prohibí expresamente a su culto que cometiese ningún asesinato; y no solo dispuso usted la muerte de ese guardia, sino que encima llevó a cabo una adivinación de sangre».

languages.text: 「お前の教団に対して殺人を明確に禁じていた。なのにお前はエンフォーサーの死を仕組んだばかりか、血のディビネーションを行いすらした」
languages.original_text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の教団に対して殺人を明確に禁じていた。なのにお前はエンフォーサーの死を仕組んだばかりか、血のディビネーションを行いすらした」

languages.text: “我明确禁止你的教派杀人，可你不仅杀死了那个执法者，还进行了鲜血占卜仪式。”
languages.original_text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."

traits.locale_text: “我明确禁止你的教派杀人，可你不仅杀死了那个执法者，还进行了鲜血占卜仪式。”

languages.text: "Ich habe Eurem Kult ausdrücklich verboten, zu töten, und dennoch habt Ihr nicht nur den Tod des Enforcers veranlasst, sondern auch eine Blutprophetie durchgeführt."
languages.original_text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Eurem Kult ausdrücklich verboten, zu töten, und dennoch habt Ihr nicht nur den Tod des Enforcers veranlasst, sondern auch eine Blutprophetie durchgeführt."

languages.text: « J'ai interdit expressément à votre culte de tuer et pourtant, non seulement vous avez orchestré la mort de ce prévôt, mais vous vous êtes également livrée à un rituel de divination sanglant. »
languages.original_text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai interdit expressément à votre culte de tuer et pourtant, non seulement vous avez orchestré la mort de ce prévôt, mais vous vous êtes également livrée à un rituel de divination sanglant. »

languages.text: "Tarikatının cinayet işlemesini özellikle yasaklamıştım. Hâl böyle iken hem o infazcının ölmesine sebebiyet verdin hem de kanla kehanette bulundun."
languages.original_text: "I expressly forbade your cult from killing, and yet, not only did you arrange for that enforcer to die, you also performed a blood divination."
